about_the_game:
The "Way of The Hunter" DLC offers a new role-playing perspective to life as a Ghoul Hunter. Character creation is now possible at the beginning of the game. Customize your name, appearance, body type, and character class which will have significant impact on the character's stats and skills.

Note: this DLC is recommended to get for a more interesting second playthrough. It is not necessary for the original "STALKER-like" experience.

  • 12 types of skills to develop
  • 6 appearances to choose from
  • 4 body physique types to customize starting character stats
  • 9 preset classes, each with a different set of starting skills, and a special ability unique to this class
  • Existing playthrough can earn XP and skills as well - no need to start a new game
